alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 27 at 2:53PM MST until July 27 at 7:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: .Monsoonal moisture in place over the region will lead to additional thunderstorm activity today capable of heavy rainfall and flash flooding. This risk will be greatest for burn scars, but several area roads could also experience flooding. ...FLOOD WATCH HAS BEEN EXTENDED THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by multiple rounds of thunderstorms producing excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following areas, Northwest Deserts and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff and heavy downpours may result in the rapid onset of flooding in area washes, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
info.instruction: You should monitor the forecast and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. If you come across a flooded roadway, turn around, don`t drown.
